title: Garlic seafood pasta
ingredients: ['400g linguine', '2 tbsp olive oil', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 tbsp dry white wine or vermouth', '250g cherry tomatoes, quartered', '2 x 220g packs ready-to-eat or frozen cooked seafood mix', '3 tbsp half-fat crème fraîche', '25g fresh flat-leaf parsley, roughly chopped']
